text: "Boomerang" is a song by South Korean boy band Wanna One. The song serves as the lead single of their album, 0+1=1 (I Promise You). ==Charts== ===Weekly chart=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" ! scope="col"| Chart (2018) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| South Korea (Gaon) | 3 |} ==Awards and nominations== ===MBC Plus X Genie Music Awards=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
